##Importing dataset created with DataMerge_PMCP_100617.Rmd (and then race from MP and growth curve mdoel slope was later added) and then modified with CreatingCompositeScores_PMCP_112017.Rmd
```{r}
Data = read.csv('/Users/tylerhein/Dropbox/PMCP paper/Data from PMCP/PMCPThreatDepInt_Full310_RaceGCM_Z112017.csv')
```
##Setting up SEM path models - see lavaan.ugent.be/tutorial/sem.html for example that I used
```{r}
library(lavaan)
```
#Specify Model 1 - Threat Dep predicting age 15 scores on CDI and MASC 
```{r}
Model1 <- ' Threat =~ hold60m_punitivediscipline + AGGR42 + angout + AvHostility
				    Dep=~ AvInvolvement + hom24ipl + IncometoNeeds.Average + MeanMEduc
            masc15total ~ Threat
            cdi15total ~ Dep
            masc15total ~~ cdi15total'
```
##Fit Model 1 with MLR estimator and FIML for missing data
```{r}
fit <- sem(Model1, data = Data, missing= "ML", estimator = "MLR")
summary(fit, fit.measures=TRUE, standardized=TRUE, rsquare = TRUE, modindices=TRUE)
```
#Specify Model 1R - Threat Dep predicting age 15 scores on CDI and MASC, race included 
```{r}
Model1R <- ' Threat =~ hold60m_punitivediscipline + AGGR42 + angout + AvHostility
				    Dep=~ AvInvolvement + hom24ipl + IncometoNeeds.Average + MeanMEduc
            Threat ~ CAUCRACE
            Dep ~ CAUCRACE
            masc15total ~ Threat
            cdi15total ~ Dep
            masc15total ~~ cdi15total'
```
##Fit Model 1R with MLR estimator and FIML for missing data
```{r}
fit <- sem(Model1R, data = Data, missing= "ML", estimator = "MLR")
summary(fit, fit.measures=TRUE, standardized=TRUE, rsquare = TRUE, modindices=TRUE)
```
#Specify Model 2 - Threat Dep predicting age 20 lifetime diagnosis of depressive or anxiety disorders
